reviews.text: Orange Elephant Roofing & Solar Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

Worst company ever!! Started working with them 4/2023, roof and siding half ass completed 10/23. Have many issues that are needing to be fixed. Their headquaters in Texas don’t really care about what is going on in Illinois. Company has had … More

OUTSTANDING Roofing Contractor!   Supervisor Pat Cox worked directly with my insurance company to maximize my hail damage claim on a 22 yr old roof.  Then executed the removal and replacement with excellent communication before and during … More

Orange Elephant came around and knocked on our door after some bad hail storms in our area.   They worked with our insurance company and got us approved for a new roof on the house, and garage & new gutters.  The whole process was pretty … More Response from the owner 2 years ago

Hi Kristen! We are so happy to hear that Chase and Chris took good care of you and your home after a hail storm. We hope to hear from your neighbors soon! Thank you for such a kind review! Get the most out of Google Maps Map data ©2025 GoogleUnited StatesTermsPrivacySend Product Feedback
